snippet.title: Johnny Depp Scores Victory Against Ex Wife Amber Heard- $7M Divorce Settlement.
snippet.description:
Johnny Depp has gained a rare court success in his ongoing legal struggle with Amber Heard, whether his ex-wife made good on her promise to donate $7 million from their divorce settlement.

After their 2016 breakup, Heard stated that she didn't want Depp's money and promised to donate it to the American Civil Liberties Union (ACLU) and Children's Hospital Los Angeles.

Lawyers, on the other hand, claim that Heard did not mislead about the donations because she agreed to pay the money over a ten-year period.

Adam Waldman, the lawyer for the "Pirates of the Caribbean" star, has alleged that she did not donate the full amount she pledged.

Waldman pointed out that the payments were not from the divorce settlement money, but rather from anonymous donors.

Elaine Bredehoft, Heard's attorney, acknowledged in January that her client had yet to complete her $7 million pledge to the CHLA and ACLU, citing financial concerns.
